<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;Medical Plan&#148;) for Employee and Employee&#146;s spouse and dependents consistent with the level of coverage otherwise in effect as of Employee&#146;s termination date for the period beginning on Employee&#146;s termination date and ending on the earlier of (I)&nbsp;twelve (12) months after Employee&#146;s termination date or (II)&nbsp;the date on which Employee, Employee&#146;s spouse or Employee&#146;s dependents obtains comparable alternative group coverage during the twelve (12) months after Employee&#146;s termination (such period being referred to as the &#147;Continuation Period&#148;), at Employee&#146;s sole expense, and for each year (or portion thereof) during the Continuation Period, the Company shall pay to Employee an amount such that, after the payment of all income and employment taxes due with respect to such amount, there remains an amount equal to the Company&#146;s premium contribution paid with respect to its similarly-situated active employees for the level of coverage provided to Employee and Employee&#146;s spouse and Employee&#146;s dependents under the Medical Plan during the portion of the Continuation Period within such year.&#160; Any payments to be made to Employee pursuant to the preceding sentence shall be made no earlier than the Release Date (and only if the Release Requirements are satisfied as of the Release Date) and no later than March&nbsp;15 of the year following the year to which they relate.&#160; The Medical Continuation Benefits shall not be deemed to offset or otherwise limit the period of continuation coverage otherwise available to Employee and Employee&#146;s spouse or Employee&#146;s dependents under section 4980B of the Code which shall be deemed to commence following the end of the Continuation Period and shall be provided at Employee&#146;s sole expense.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	As used in this Agreement, the term &#147;earned but unpaid Annual Bonus&#148; shall refer to the non-discretionary portion of the Annual Bonus to which Employee would have been entitled had Employee remained employed in Employee&#146;s position for the remainder of the fiscal year of termination and through the payment date for such Annual Bonus, prorated for the number of days during such year that Employee was employed by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In no event shall Employee be permitted to elect the year of payment of any amount under this Section&nbsp;2(a)(ii).

	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Employee for any reason voluntarily terminates the Term of Employment and Employee&#146;s employment.&#160; In that case, there shall be no severance paid to Employee and Employee&#146;s benefits shall terminate as of Employee&#146;s termination date, except as may be required by law or the express terms of any employee benefit plan or arrangement.

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, if Employee voluntarily terminates the Term of Employment and Employee&#146;s employment due to Retirement (as defined below), then Employee shall receive the following amounts and benefits, in addition to any amount or benefit payable under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company: (x)&nbsp;the amount of the Annual Bonus with respect to the Company&#146;s most recently completed fiscal year, if any, to the extent that such Annual Bonus has not yet been paid as of such date, which amount shall be paid in the form of a lump sum on the payment date generally applicable to such bonus; (y)&nbsp;a monthly amount equal to the Company&#146;s portion of Employee&#146;s premium or similar contribution under the Company&#146;s group medical
</FONT>

	plan, such amount to be (I)&nbsp;based upon Employee&#146;s level of enrollment in the Company&#146;s group medical plan as of his or her termination date, (II)&nbsp;paid during the 12-month period following Employee&#146;s termination date or until the date on which Employee&#146;s continuation coverage ceases in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;4980B, if earlier, and (III)&nbsp;contingent upon Employee&#146;s timely election to continue his or her coverage under the Company&#146;s group medical plan in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;4980B; and (z)&nbsp;an amount equal to Employee&#146;s average Annual Bonus paid during the Company&#146;s three most recently completed fiscal years, determined net of any deferral under the Deferred Bonus Plan, prorated for the number of days of Employee&#146;s service during the fiscal year in which Employee&#146;s terminate date occurs, payable in a lump sum within ninety (90) days following Employee&#146;s termination date.

</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Employee dies or Isle terminates the Term of Employment and Employee&#146;s employment as a result of Employee&#146;s Disability by a written notice of termination delivered to Employee.&#160; In the event Employee&#146;s employment is terminated due to Employee&#146;s death or Disability, Employee, or, in the event of death, Employee&#146;s estate or dependents, as applicable, shall receive (A)&nbsp;payment of Employee&#146;s earned but unpaid Annual Bonus and continuing payment of Employee&#146;s Annual Base Salary payable in twelve (12) substantially equal monthly installments beginning on the first day following the six (6)&nbsp;month anniversary of Employee&#146;s termination date; (B)&nbsp;continuation coverage under the Medical Plan for the Continuation Period; and (C)&nbsp;a lump sum payment to be paid on the first payroll date following Employee&#146;s termination date equal to the average of the last three (3)&nbsp;years&#146; Annual Bonus payments, if any, inclusive of deferred amounts.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, Employee shall be deemed to have a &#147;Disability&#148; if, by reason of a medically
<B>
	-
</B>
	determinable physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or to last for a continuous period of at least twelve (12) months, (I)&nbsp;Employee is unable to engage in any substantial gainful employment, or (II)&nbsp;has been receiving benefits under the Company&#146;s separate long-term disability plan for a period of at least three (3)&nbsp;months.&#160; In the event of any dispute regarding the existence of Employee&#146;s Disability hereunder,&nbsp;Isle may refer the same to a licensed practicing physician of the Company&#146;s choice who is reasonably acceptable to Employee, and Employee agrees to submit to such tests and examination as such physician shall deem appropriate and the determination by such physician shall be binding on the Company and Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The vesting of equity-based awards shall be governed by the provisions of the Equity Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If Employee is a member of the Board (and/or the board of directors or board of managers of any of Isle&#146;s affiliates) and Employee&#146;s employment hereunder terminates for any reason other than death, Employee shall, as a condition to receiving any severance
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

	6

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2228927",CP="ISLE OF CAPRI CASINOS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=1004159,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK127:[16ZAY3.16ZAY78603]8486-3-KM-01_ZAY78603.CHC",USER="AGAETZ",CD='JUN 10 17:16 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage64"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	payments and continued benefits described herein, immediately tender Employee&#146;s resignation as a member of the Board (and/or the board of directors or board of managers of any of Isle&#146;s affiliates).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Change In Control of Isle
</U>
	.&#160; If (i)&nbsp;there is a sale, acquisition, merger, or buyout of Isle to an unaffiliated person, or any person that is not an &#147;affiliate&#148; (as such term is defined under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) of Isle or any of its shareholders on the Effective Date becomes the legal and beneficial owner of more than 50% of Isle&#146;s common stock (a &#147;Change in Control&#148;), and (ii)&nbsp;Employee has a Qualifying Termination (as defined below), then in lieu of the severance payments and benefits, if any, otherwise payable to Employee under Section&nbsp;2 of the Agreement, Employee will vest in the following severance payments and benefits as of the date of the Change in Control (in the event the Qualifying Termination occurs prior to the Change in Control) or Employee&#146;s termination date (in the event the Qualifying Termination occurs upon or following the Change in Control) and Employee shall be entitled to the following severance payments and benefits, subject to the terms and conditions of this Section&nbsp;3; provided, however, that, Employee shall be entitled to such payments and benefits only if the Release Requirements are satisfied by the Release Date:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	(i)&nbsp;Two (2)&nbsp;times Employee&#146;s Annual Base Salary payable in twenty-four (24) substantially equal monthly installments, the first six (6)&nbsp;of which shall be made on the first day following the six (6)-month anniversary of Employee&#146;s termination date with the eighteen (18) remaining installments being made monthly thereafter; (ii)&nbsp;the amount of the Annual Bonus with respect to the Company&#146;s most recently completed fiscal year, if any, to the extent that such Annual Bonus has not yet been paid as of the termination date, which amount shall be paid in a lump sum on the payment date generally applicable to such bonus (but no earlier than the Release Date); and (iii)&nbsp;an amount equal to the average of the previous three (3)&nbsp;years&#146; Annual Bonus payment, if any, inclusive of deferred amounts, if any, payable in a lump sum, which lump sum shall be paid to Employee on the first day following the six (6)-month anniversary of Employee&#146;s termination date.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, provided that the Release Requirements are satisfied as of an earlier payment date designated by the Board, the Board may authorize (I)&nbsp;that portion of the payments described in Sections 3(a)(i)&nbsp;and (iii)&nbsp;that qualify as a 409A Exempt Payment (as defined in Section&nbsp;2(a)(ii)) to be paid in a lump sum to Employee on any date following the termination date and prior to the six (6)-month anniversary of Employee&#146;s termination date and the remaining such payments (that is, the payments described in Sections 3(a)(i)&nbsp;and (iii)&nbsp;minus the 409A Exempt Payment) paid to Employee in accordance with this Section&nbsp;3(a), and (II)&nbsp;the amount of the unpaid Annual Bonus with respect to the Company&#146;s most recently completed fiscal year payable in accordance with Section&nbsp;3(a)(ii)&nbsp;that is not subject to section 409A of the Code to be paid in a lump sum on any date after following Employee&#146;s termination date and prior to the Release Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Medical Continuation Benefits; provided, however, that for purposes of this Section&nbsp;3(b), the &#147;Continuation Period&#148; shall be based on twenty four (24) months rather than twelve (12) months.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Upon the occurrence of a change in control (as defined in the Equity Plan), all of Employee&#146;s outstanding equity-based awards shall governed by the provisions of the Equity Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2228927",CP="ISLE OF CAPRI CASINOS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=395911,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK127:[16ZAY3.16ZAY78603]8486-3-KM-01_ZAY78603.CHC",USER="AGAETZ",CD='JUN 10 17:16 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage65"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, a &#147;Qualifying Termination&#148; means a termination of Employee&#146;s employment with the Company by the Company without Cause by a written notice of termination delivered to Employee or a termination by Employee for Good Reason (as defined below), in either case within thirty (30) days prior to the occurrence of a Change in Control or upon or within twelve (12) months after a Change in Control.&#160; For purposes of this Agreement, Employee&#146;s termination shall be considered to be for &#147;Good Reason&#148; if Employee terminates Employee&#146;s employment with the Company within the time period described above following (I)&nbsp;a significant reduction in Employee&#146;s authority, responsibilities, position or compensation or (II)&nbsp;a material relocation of the principal place at which Employee performs services hereunder, but in no event less than thirty-five (35) miles from the principal place at which Employee performs such services immediately prior to the Change in Control, in either case which the Company has failed to remedy within thirty (30) days after receipt of Employee&#146;s written notice thereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In no event shall Employee be permitted to elect the year of payment of any amount under this Section&nbsp;3.&#160; Further, notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section&nbsp;3, if the definition of a Change in Control does not constitute a change in control event within the meaning of section 409A of the Code, payments pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3 shall, to the extent required to comply with section 409A of the Code, be paid at the same time and in the same form as corresponding payments and benefits otherwise payable under Section&nbsp;2(a)(ii).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section&nbsp;3, if (1)&nbsp;during the period beginning on the first anniversary of Employee&#146;s termination date and ending on the second anniversary thereof (the &#147;Second Year Period&#148;), Employee is or becomes employed by a new employer, and (2)&nbsp;such new employment would be prohibited by the provisions of Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;if the post-termination restrictions of Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;applied during the Second Year Period (which they do not), then, Employee shall forfeit all future payments and benefits under this Section&nbsp;3 and all future payments and benefits shall thereupon cease.&#160; Nothing in this paragraph is intended to relieve Employee of the restrictions of Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;for the first year following Employee&#146;s termination date or to result in a forfeiture of payments and benefits during the Second Year Period if Employee is or becomes employed by a new Employer if such new employment would not be prohibited by the provisions of Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;if the post-termination restrictions of Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;applied during the Second Year Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Confidentiality, Non-Competition and Non-Solicitation
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	The Company&#146;s Business
</U>
	.&#160; It is expressly agreed by the parties that, as of the Effective Date, the Company is (i)&nbsp;engaged in the business of owning, managing and operating gaming and casino facilities in the states of Missouri, Mississippi,&nbsp;Iowa, Louisiana, Colorado, Pennsylvania and Florida, (ii)&nbsp;is licensed to own, manage and operate gaming and casino facilities in the state of Nevada, (iii)&nbsp;is in the business of seeking new gaming properties in additional jurisdictions and (iv)&nbsp;is engaged in all aspects of such gaming and casino operations.&#160; Employee desires to continue to be employed by the Company from and after the Effective Date and acknowledges and agrees that the Company would be adversely affected if Employee competes with the Company during, and subsequent to, Employee&#146;s employment with the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	8

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Trade Secrets and Confidential Information
</U>
	.&#160; The Company and Employee acknowledge the existence of trade secrets and other confidential information as defined below (collectively referred to as &#147;Confidential Information&#148;), all of which are owned by the Company, regardless of whether such Confidential Information was conceived, originated, devised or supplemented by Employee, the Company, or any other person or entity.&#160; Employee acknowledges that Employee has had and will continue to have access to Confidential Information during Employee&#146;s employment with the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Except as required by law, during the term of this Agreement and thereafter, Employee shall not, without the prior written consent of the Company, directly or indirectly disclose or disseminate to any other person, firm or organization, any Confidential Information other than on behalf of the Company.&#160; The foregoing obligation shall not apply to any Confidential Information that shall have become known to competitors of the Company or to the public other than through an act or omission by Employee or that shall have been disclosed to Employee by a person or entity unaffiliated with the Company who has legitimate possession thereof in its entirety and possesses the unrestricted right to make such disclosure.&#160; Further, nothing in this Section&nbsp;4 prohibits Employee from reporting violations of law to a governmental agency or entity.&#160; Employee agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Company from and against any damages (including attorneys&#146; fees, court costs, investigative costs and amounts paid in settlement) suffered by the Company or any of its affiliates arising out of the unauthorized disclosure or use of Confidential Information by Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;Confidential Information&#148; shall mean any data or information and documentation, whether in tangible form, electronic form or verbally disclosed, that is of material value to the Company and not known to the public or the Company&#146;s competitors, and which the Company has kept confidential.&#160; To the fullest extent consistent with the foregoing and as otherwise lawful, Confidential Information shall include, without limitation, the Company&#146;s trade secrets, computer programs, sales techniques and reports, formulas, data processes, methods, articles of manufacture, machines, apparatus, designs, compositions of matter, products, improvements, inventions, discoveries, developmental or experimental work, corporate strategy, marketing techniques, pricing lists and data and other pricing information, business plans, ideas and opportunities, accounting and financial information including financial statements and projections, personnel records, specialized customer information, proprietary agreements with vendors, special products and services the Company may offer or provide to its customers/guests from time to time, pending acquisitions, negotiations and transactions, or the terms of existing proposed business arrangements.&#160; Confidential Information shall also include all customer lists, accounts and specifications, and contacts of the Company, and shall further include work in progress, plans or any other matter belonging
</FONT>
	to or relating to the technical or business activities of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Employee, at the time of the effective date of the termination of the employment relationship with the Company, shall turn over to the Company all &#147;Confidential Information&#148; and any and all copies thereof in Employee&#146;s possession regardless of who provided Employee with such information.&#160; Should Employee be legally served with a lawfully issued subpoena expressly directing Employee to turn over the Company&#146;s Confidential Information, Employee shall immediately, and certainly no later than five (5)&nbsp;days after notice, advise the Company in writing of the subpoena and also provide a copy of the subpoena to the Company, at its lawful
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage66"></A>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	address as stated in this Agreement, thereby providing the Company with adequate time to lawfully object to the disclosure of its Confidential Information.&#160; Employee&#146;s failure to immediately advise the Company of the subpoena shall subject Employee to any and all remedies afforded to the Company, including, but not limited to, damages resulting to the Company for breach of contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Employee agrees that all such Confidential Information is, and shall remain, the sole and exclusive property of the Company and Employee further agrees that during and after
</FONT>
	the Term of Employment, Employee will not publish, disclose, communicate or otherwise disseminate to any entity and/or person any Confidential Information.&#160; Employee acknowledges and agrees that such Confidential Information is of critical importance to the Company and its business, and any unauthorized dissemination of such information would cause great harm to the Company, thereby entitling the Company to any and all rights and remedies as provided by law, and as specifically provided in Section&nbsp;5 of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Employee hereby assigns and agrees to assign to the Company any invention, improvement, or discovery made by Employee, alone or jointly with others, during the Term of Employment, including any period of authorized leave of absence, or as a result of Employee&#146;s employment, and which in any way relates to, or may be useful in, the business of the Company, together with each patent that may be obtained thereon in any country.&#160; Employee will promptly and fully disclose to the Company any such invention, improvement or discovery and, without further consideration, will upon request by the Company execute all proper papers for use in applying for, obtaining and maintaining any United States or foreign patent and all proper assignments thereof, at the Company&#146;s expense and through its Patent Counsel.&#160; Each such
</FONT>
	invention, improvement or discovery, whether or not patented, shall be the exclusive property of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Restrictions on Competition
</U>
	.&#160; In exchange for consideration of employment, and in consideration for Employee receiving and being given access to confidential business information, including, but not limited to trade secrets, customer and supplier contacts and relationships, goodwill, loyalty and other information, and as a condition of employment of Employee by the Company, during the term of Employee&#146;s employment with the Company, and for a period of one (1)&nbsp;year after the voluntary or involuntary termination of Employee&#146;s employment with the Company for any reason whatsoever, Employee will refrain from carrying on or engaging in the casino or gaming business (as defined in Section&nbsp;4(a)), or, without the written consent of the Company (which shall not be unreasonably withheld), the hotel or restaurant business, or any other business in which the Company may be engaged on Employee&#146;s termination date, in any case either directly or indirectly, either individually or jointly or on behalf of or in concert with any other person, as a proprietor, partner, shareholder, investor (other than in less than 5% of any class of securities of any publicly traded company), lender, financial backer, director, officer, employee, agent, advisor, consultant or manager, or in any other capacity or manner whatsoever.&#160; The provisions of this Section&nbsp;4(c)&nbsp;apply to any gaming operation or gaming facility within a 75-mile radius of (A)&nbsp;any gaming operation or gaming facility owned (in whole or in part) by the Company or with respect to which the Company renders or proposes to render consulting or management services, in each case on the Effective Date or, for periods after Employee&#146;s termination date, on such termination date, or (B)&nbsp;any of
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	10
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_8_HTM_8486-3-KM-03_PB_10_171835_7056">

<A NAME="eolPage67"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	the foregoing as
</FONT>
	to which the Company has taken any substantive step toward owning (in whole or in part) or managing such facility in the future.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Non-Solicitation of Employees
</U>
	.&#160; In exchange for and in consideration of continuing employment, and in consideration for Employee receiving and being given access to confidential business information, including, but not limited to trade secrets, customer and supplier contacts and relationships, goodwill, loyalty and other information, and as a condition of continuing employment of Employee by the Company, during the term of Employee&#146;s employment with the Company and for one (1)&nbsp;year after Employee&#146;s termination date for any reason, Employee shall not, without the prior written consent of the Company, either directly or indirectly, either individually or jointly or on behalf of or in concert with any other person, as a proprietor, partner, shareholder, investor (other than in less than 5% of any class of securities of any publicly traded company), lender, financial backer, director, officer, employee, agent, advisor, consultant or manager, or in any other capacity or manner whatsoever, solicit for hire, enter into any contract or other arrangement with, or interfere with, disrupt or attempt to interfere with or disrupt the Company&#146;s relationships with, any person, who is employed by the Company; provided that for periods after Employee&#146;s termination date the foregoing shall apply only to a person who, as of Employee&#146;s termination date is employed by the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Reasonable Terms
</U>
	.&#160; Employee agrees that the geographic areas, duration and scope of activities outlined in this Agreement are reasonable under the circumstances.&#160; Employee further agrees that such terms are no broader than necessary to protect the Company&#146;s business and maintain the confidentiality of the Confidential Information.&#160; Employee further agrees that the terms of this Agreement are not oppressive and will not impose an unreasonable burden or restraint on Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<U>
	Miscellaneous
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Successors and Assigns
</U>
	.&#160; This Agreement is binding on and inures to the benefit of the Company&#146;s successors and assigns.&#160; Isle may assign this Agreement in connection with a merger, consolidation, assignment, sale or other disposition of substantially all of its assets or business (subject to the provisions of Section&nbsp;4).&#160; This Agreement may not be assigned by Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Modification, Waivers
</U>
	.&#160; This Agreement may be modified or amended only by a writing signed by an authorized representative of Isle and Employee.&#160; To the extent that the provision of Medical Continuation Benefits under this Agreement would subject the Company to a material tax or penalty, the Company shall have the authority to amend the Agreement to the limited extent reasonably necessary to avoid such tax or penalty and shall use all reasonable efforts to provide Employee with a comparable benefit that does not subject the Company to such tax or penalty.&#160; The Company&#146;s failure, or delay in exercising any right, or partial exercise of any right, will not waive any provision of this Agreement or preclude the Company from otherwise or further exercising any rights or remedies hereunder, or any other rights or remedies granted by any law or any related document.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

</U>
	.&#160; The laws of Missouri will govern the validity, construction, and performance of this Agreement without regard to the location of

	execution or performance of this Agreement.&#160; Except as provided in paragraph (d)&nbsp;below, any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this Agreement, or the breach thereof, shall be settled by binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association under its Commercial Arbitration Rules, and judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator(s)&nbsp;may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof.&#160; Both Isle and Employee hereby consent to this binding arbitration provision.

<U>
	Remedies
</U>
	.&#160; Employee expressly acknowledges and the parties recognize that the restrictions contained in Section&nbsp;4 herein are reasonable and necessary to protect the business and interests of the Company, and that any violation of these restrictions will cause substantial irreparable injury and damage to the Company, and the extent of such damage would be difficult if not impossible to calculate.&#160; Accordingly, the parties to this Agreement expressly agree that (i)&nbsp;if Employee breaches any provision of Section&nbsp;4 of this Agreement, the damage to the Company may be substantial, although difficult to ascertain, and monetary damages may not afford an adequate remedy, and (ii)&nbsp;if Employee is in breach of any provision of this Agreement, or threatens a breach of this Agreement, the Company shall be entitled, in addition to all other rights and remedies as may be provided by law, to seek specific performance and injunctive and other equitable relief, including, but not limited to, restraining orders and preliminary and permanent injunctions, to enforce the provisions of Section&nbsp;4 of this Agreement, as well as to prevent or restrain a breach of any provisions of this Agreement.&#160; The parties expressly agree that the Company has these specific and express rights to injunctive relief without posting any bond that might be requested or required, and without the necessity of proving irreparable injury, and that Employee expressly agrees not to claim in any such equitable proceedings that a remedy at law is available to the Company.&#160; The existence of any claim or cause of action by Employee, whether predicated on this Agreement or otherwise, shall not constitute a defense to the enforcement by the Company or any of its affiliates of any provision hereof.&#160; The parties to this Agreement also expressly agree that the Company is entitled to recover any and all damages for any losses sustained, and rights of which it has been deprived, as well as any damages allowed by law.
</P>

	If any proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because of an alleged dispute, breach or default in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the successful or prevailing party or parties shall be entitled to recover reasonable attorney&#146;s fees and other costs incurred in that proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it may be entitled.&#160; All of the remedies for breach of this Agreement available to a party shall be cumulative and the pursuit of one remedy shall not be deemed to exclude any other remedies.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(l)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Special 409A Provisions
</U>
	. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Agreement to the contrary, if any payment hereunder is subject to section 409A of the Code and if such payment is to be paid on account of Employee&#146;s separation from service (within the meaning of section 409A of the Code), if Employee is a specified employee (within the meaning of section 409A(a)(2)(B)&nbsp;of the Code), and if any such payment is required to be made prior to the first day of the seventh month following Employee&#146;s separation from service, such payment shall be delayed until the first day of the seventh month following Employee&#146;s separation from service.&#160; To the extent that any payments or benefits under this Agreement are subject to section 409A of the Code and are paid or provided on account of Employee&#146;s termination of employment or the Term of Employment, the determination as to whether Employee has had a termination of employment (or separation from service) shall be made in accordance with section 409A of the Code and the guidance issued thereunder without application of any alternative levels of reductions of bona fide services permitted thereunder.&#160; Any delayed payment shall be made without liability for interest or other loss of investment opportunity.&#160; Any installment payment hereunder is treated as a separate payment for purposes of section 409A of the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(m)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	No Mitigation or Offset
</U>
	.&#160; Employee shall not be required to mitigate the amount of any payment provide for herein by seeking other employment or otherwise, and any such payment will not be reduced in the event such other employment is obtained.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	14
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_8_HTM_8486-3-KM-03_PB_14_172014_3020">

<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_9_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_5"></A>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.9
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AMENDED AND RESTATED EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:36.2PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THIS AMENDED AND RESTATED EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
	(the &#147;Agreement&#148;) is made and entered into by and between Isle of Capri Casinos,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and Michael A. Hart (&#147;Employee&#148;) and is intended to be effective as of the date set forth below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, Employee and the Company are currently parties to that certain employment agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;11, 2008 (the &#147;Prior Agreement&#148;), pursuant to which Employee is currently employed as the Company&#146;s Vice President, Treasury and Risk Management;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, the parties desire that (i)&nbsp;Employee continue to serve as the Company&#146;s Vice President, Treasury and Risk Management through April&nbsp;27, 2016, and (ii)&nbsp;beginning on April&nbsp;28, 2016 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;), Employee serve as the Company&#146;s Senior Vice President of Accounting, Treasurer and Assistant Secretary;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, the Company desires to continue to employ Employee from and after the Effective Date in the position of its Senior Vice President of Accounting, Treasurer and Assistant Secretary, and Employee desires to continue to perform services for, and to continue to be employed by, the Company in such capacity, all on the terms and conditions set forth herein; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, this Agreement shall become effective as of the Effective Date only if Employee is employed by the Company on the Effective Date and the Prior Agreement shall remain in effect until the Effective Date, subject to the terms and conditions thereof, whereupon the Prior Agreement shall be superseded by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual promises, covenants and conditions set forth in this Agreement,&nbsp;Isle and Employee agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Employment and Term.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Position.&#160;
</B>
	The Company and/or an affiliated employer of the Company shall employ and retain Employee as its Senior Vice President of Accounting, Treasurer and Assistant Secretary or in such other capacity or capacities as may be mutually agreed upon from time to time, and Employee agrees to be so employed, subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein.&#160; Employee&#146;s duties and responsibilities shall be those assigned to him or her by the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer, to whom Employee shall initially report.&#160; Employee agrees to discharge such duties in a reasonable and customary manner.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.2
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Affiliated Employer.&#160;
</B>
	Employee acknowledges that he or she may perform services for the benefit of or be employed by an affiliate of the Company and a transfer of employment between the Company or any affiliate or among or between affiliates of the Company shall not constitute a termination of Employee&#146;s employment unless otherwise specified herein.&#160; Employee agrees that, except as otherwise provided herein or where the context clearly indicates the contrary, any reference to the Company herein shall be deemed to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2228927",CP="ISLE OF CAPRI CASINOS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=5005,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK127:[16ZAY3.16ZAY78603]8486-3-KO-01_ZAY78603.CHC",USER="AGAETZ",CD='JUN 10 20:54 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage73"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	include any such affiliate and that, to the maximum extent permitted by law, the protections described in Section&nbsp;5 hereof shall be deemed to apply to the Company, any such affiliate and any other affiliate of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.3
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Full Time and Attention.&#160;
</B>
	Employee agrees that he or she will devote his or her full time and attention to the performance of his or her duties hereunder.&#160; Employee will not, without the prior written consent of the Company be engaged, whether or not during normal business hours, in any other business or professional activity, whether or not such activity is pursued for gain, profit or other pecuniary advantage.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.4
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Term.&#160;
</B>
	Employee&#146;s employment shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue for a series of successive one-year terms, unless earlier terminated as provided in Sections 3 or 4 hereof (the period during which Employee is employed hereunder referred to as the &#147;Employment Term&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Compensation and Benefits.&#160;
</B>
	As of the Effective Date, the Company shall pay to Employee the annual base compensation set forth on
<U>
	Exhibit&nbsp;A
</U>
	hereto (Employee&#146;s &#147;Base Compensation&#148;) and such other bonus, equity incentive, fringe and employee benefits, as may be set forth on such exhibit, the terms of which are incorporated herein by this reference. Such benefits and amounts may be adjusted, from time to time, on
<U>
	Exhibit&nbsp;A
</U>
	hereto or may be evidenced by a separate plan, policy or program sponsored by the Company or in the form of an agreement by and between the Company and Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Termination and Nonrenewal.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Special Definition.&#160;
</B>
	As used herein, the term &#147;Basic Severance&#148; shall mean the aggregate of the following amounts and benefits:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The continuation of Employee&#146;s annualized Base Compensation in effect as of the date on which his or her employment ceases (Employee&#146;s &#147;Termination Date&#148;), which amount shall be divided and paid in substantially equal installments during the 12-month period following such date, in accordance with the Company&#146;s regular pay date practices;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The bonus due under the Company&#146;s annual incentive plan in which Employee participates as of his or her Termination Date (&#147;Annual Incentive Plan&#148;) with respect to the Company&#146;s most recently completed fiscal year, if any, to the extent that such bonus has not yet been paid as of Employee&#146;s Termination Date, which amount shall be paid on the payment date generally applicable to such bonus; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	A monthly amount equal to the Company&#146;s portion of Employee&#146;s premium or similar contribution required under the Company&#146;s group medical plan as an active employee, such amount to be (i)&nbsp;based upon Employee&#146;s level of enrollment in such plan as of his or her Termination Date, (ii)&nbsp;paid monthly during the 12-month period following Employee&#146;s Termination Date or until Employee&#146;s coverage ceases in accordance with Section&nbsp;4980B of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the &#147;Code&#148;), if earlier, and (iii)&nbsp;contingent
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	2
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_9_HTM_8486-3-KO-01_PB_2_195720_711">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2228927",CP="ISLE OF CAPRI CASINOS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=534804,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK127:[16ZAY3.16ZAY78603]8486-3-KO-01_ZAY78603.CHC",USER="AGAETZ",CD='JUN 10 20:54 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage74"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	upon Employee&#146;s timely election to continue his or her coverage under the Company&#146;s group medical plan in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;4980B.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:36.2PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, if Basic Severance is payable to Employee pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.4, payments of the Basic Severance will commence as of the 60
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	th
</FONT>
	&#160;day following Employee&#146;s Termination Date (the &#147;Payment Start Date&#148;) if, as of the Payment Start Date, the release requirements described in Section&nbsp;3.4 are satisfied and any payments that would otherwise have been made after Employee&#146;s Termination Date and prior to the Payment Start Date shall be paid in a lump sum on the Payment Start Date; provided, however, that if and to the extent that the Basic Severance is not subject to Code Section&nbsp;409A, then the Company, in its sole discretion, may commence payment of the Basic Severance prior to the Payment Start Date and after the release requirements are satisfied.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.2
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Termination on Account of Death or Disability.&#160;
</B>
	If Employee dies or becomes Disabled during the Employment Term, this Agreement and Employee&#146;s employment hereunder shall terminate.&#160; In such event, the Company shall pay or provide to Employee (or to his or her estate) (a)&nbsp;the amount of any accrued but unpaid Base Compensation, (b)&nbsp;Basic Severance, and (c)&nbsp;any other amount or benefit to which Employee may be entitled under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company.&#160; Employee shall be deemed &#147;Disabled&#148; hereunder if he or she is (a)&nbsp;unable to engage in any substantial gainful activity due to a medically-determinable physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or to last for a continuous period of at least 12 months, or (b)&nbsp;receiving benefits under the Company&#146;s separate long-term disability plan for a period of at least three months as a result of a medically-determinable physical or mental impairment. The Company shall certify whether Employee is Disabled as defined herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.3
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Termination on Account of Employee&#146;s Voluntary Resignation.&#160;
</B>
	Employee may terminate this Agreement and his or her employment hereunder, upon 30 days prior written notice to the Company or such shorter period as may be agreed upon by the parties hereto.&#160; In such event, the Company shall pay to Employee the amount of his or her accrued but unpaid Base Compensation. No additional payments or benefits shall be due hereunder, except as may be required under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company or as may be required by law to be provided.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If Employee voluntarily terminates this Agreement and his or her employment hereunder on or after the date on which he or she attains age 65 and has completed at least ten (10)&nbsp;years of service with the Company, then notwithstanding any provision of any plan, policy, contract or arrangement to the contrary, he or she shall receive the following amounts and benefits, in addition to any amount or benefit payable under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Treatment of any and all equity awards will be determined by the applicable award agreement and the terms of the Equity Plan (as defined in Section&nbsp;4).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The amount of any bonus due under the Annual Incentive Plan with respect to the Company&#146;s most recently completed fiscal year, if any, to the extent that such
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	3
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_9_HTM_8486-3-KO-01_PB_3_195742_7056">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage75"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	bonus has not yet been paid as of such date, which amount shall be paid in the form of a single-sum on the payment date generally applicable to such bonus;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	A monthly amount equal to the Company&#146;s portion of Employee&#146;s premium or similar contribution under the Company&#146;s group medical plan, such amount to be (i)&nbsp;based upon Employee&#146;s level of enrollment in the Company&#146;s group medical plan as of his or her Termination Date, (ii)&nbsp;paid monthly during the 12-month period following Employee&#146;s Termination Date or until the date on which Employee&#146;s continuation coverage ceases in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;4980B, if earlier, and (iii)&nbsp;contingent upon Employee&#146;s timely election to continue his or her coverage under the Company&#146;s group medical plan in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;4980B; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	d.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	An amount equal to Employee&#146;s average bonus paid under the Annual Incentive Plan during the Company&#146;s three most recently completed fiscal years, multiplied by a fraction (i)&nbsp;the numerator of which is the number of days of Employee&#146;s service during the fiscal year in which Employee&#146;s Termination Date occurs, and (ii)&nbsp;the denominator of which is 365.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.4
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Termination by the Company Without Cause.&#160;
</B>
	The Company may terminate this Agreement and Employee&#146;s employment hereunder at any time, without Cause (as defined below), with not less than 30 days prior written notice to Employee, unless a shorter period is agreed upon by the parties hereto.&#160; In such event, the Company shall pay to Employee his or her accrued but unpaid Base Compensation, provide any benefits otherwise required by law to be provided, and pay any amount or benefit otherwise required under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company.&#160; In the event that Employee executes a general release in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to the Company and if the revocation period has expired prior to the Payment Start Date, the Company shall further provide to Employee Basic Severance in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.5
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Company&#146;s Termination for Cause.&#160;
</B>
	The Company may terminate this Agreement and Employee&#146;s employment hereunder at any time for Cause.&#160; In such event, the Company shall pay to Employee the amount of his or her accrued but unpaid Base Compensation.&#160; No additional payments or benefits shall be due hereunder, except as may be required under a separate plan, policy or program maintained by the Company or as may be required by law to be provided.&#160; For purposes of this Agreement, the term &#147;Cause&#148; shall mean that Employee has:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Committed an intentional act of fraud, embezzlement or theft in the course of his or her employment or otherwise engaged in any intentional misconduct which is materially injurious to the Company&#146;s financial condition or business reputation;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Committed intentional damage to the property of the Company or committed intentional wrongful disclosure of Confidential Information (as defined below) which is materially injurious to the Company&#146;s financial condition or business reputation;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	4
<A NAME="A2228927ZEX-10_9_HTM_8486-3-KO-01_PB_4_195754_5335">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

	c.

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

</FONT>
	Willfully and substantially refused to perform the essential duties of his or her position, which has not been cured within 30 days following written notice by the Company;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	e.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Committed a material breach of this Agreement, which has not been cured within 30 days following receipt of written notice of the breach from the Company, which shall include but not be limited to, the failure to timely obtain or to maintain in good standing applicable licensure or registration requirements;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">

	f.

</FONT>
	Intentionally, recklessly or negligently violated any material provision of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 or any of the rules&nbsp;adopted by the Securities and Exchange Commission implementing any such provision; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
